summary:
Me as a spark. Worlds as gases.

Every possibility is a spark that I allow to catch fire. Every spark is a trigger for different worlds. These worlds catch fire, illuminating infinite possible routes as if they were gases in contact with a spark. Routes that take shape and come together with one goal: to create value. As in life, this is my approach to solutions engineering: select and move the puzzle pieces until you find the perfect size, until everything is in its place in the smallest detail. "Everything In Its Right Place," as Radiohead says.

And the creation of value is possible only thanks to people. I strongly believe in people and in sharing know-how to achieve common goals. I am an extremely empathetic person and a careful observer. My overall vision, curiosity, ability to synthesize, and attention to detail allow me to be a point of reference in any context I find myself in.

certifications.name: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt
certifications.authority: Tor Vergata Lean Six Sigma Academy

company.name: Tor Vergata Lean Six Sigma Academy

projects.title: Dimensionamento di Reti Neurali
projects.description: Programmazione e confronto tra classificatori lineari (di tipo Ridge Classifier e Support Vector Machine) e reti neurali (di tipo Feed-Forward e Restricted Boltzmann Machine) per il riconoscimento di eventi sonori.

projects.title: MIDI Trigger System
projects.description: Il sistema realizzato consiste nell'utilizzo di sensori piezoelettrici interfacciati tramite una breadboard e Arduino Due. Ogni vibrazione percepita da uno dei sensori comporta la riproduzione di un suono (tramite protocollo MIDI) con dinamica direttamente proporzionale all'entità della vibrazione stessa.

projects.title: Dimensionamento di Sistemi Radar
projects.description: Dimensionamento di sistemi radar di diverse tipologie, forme d'onda e tecniche di elaborazione. Valutazione delle prestazioni ottenibili con le diverse configurazioni prese in considerazione.

projects.title: Dimensionamento di Reti di Telecomunicazioni
projects.description: Progettazione di algoritmi per il controllo e la gestione della risorsa in sistemi sia centralizzati sia distribuiti, con accesso sia di tipo random sia di tipo schedulato. Analisi degli strumenti metodologici e analitici necessari al dimensionamento della rete (modelli di Markov, processi stocastici di Poisson, teoria delle code, etc).

publications.name: Technical–economic Analysis to Identify the Acceptable Maximum Attenuation on PON FTTH Lines for Wholesale Network Operators

authors.headline: Technical Customer Support Specialist presso Fastweb
Specialista senior Network Creation - Rete Core

Associate Professor  at Electronic Engineering Dept. - University of Rome Tor Vergata

profile_positions.description:
▶ Expanded responsibilities to include supporting both Upmarket and Downmarket accounts in Italy. Continued supporting Downmarket for Israel, Spain, Greece, Croatia, Malta, Cyprus, and other EMEA regions. Provide pre-sales support by delivering impactful technical presentations and demonstrations to showcase the capabilities of UCC solutions, effectively communicating complex concepts to diverse audiences.

▶ Collaborate with customers to design and architect customized Unified Communication and Collaboration (UCC) solutions, considering their business needs, network infrastructure, security requirements, and integration possibilities. Lead the execution of Proof of Concepts (PoCs), configuring and deploying UCC solutions, troubleshooting issues, and guiding customers throughout the evaluation process.

▶ Foster cross-functional collaboration with sales, product management, and support teams to gather and share customer feedback, align on product roadmap priorities, and contribute to organizational success. Serve as a trusted technical advisor to customers, offering consultation on best practices, implementation strategies, and optimization of UCC solutions.
profile_positions.title: Senior Sales Engineer - Upmarket & Downmarket

profile_positions.description:
▶ Support EMEA Account Executives and Managers throughout the sales process by conducting product demonstrations, delivering presentations, and providing continuous support. Designed, developed, and implemented complex IT solutions for clients in Italy, Greece, Croatia, Malta, Cyprus, and other EMEA regions, leveraging technologies such as APIs, SDKs, phone infrastructure, and contact center services.

▶ Engage with clients to understand their requirements, align Zoom's solutions with their business objectives, and provided continuous support for Proof of Concepts (POCs) to ensure successful implementation and integration. Additionally, conduct industry analysis to assist Business Development Representatives (BDRs) and salespeople in generating a robust sales pipeline, particularly in the target regions.

▶ Promote interdepartmental teamwork between sales, product management, and support groups to collect and exchange customer input, establish agreement on key product development goals, and contribute to the overall achievements of the organization. Assume the role of a reliable technical consultant for clients, providing guidance on optimal approaches, implementation tactics, and enhancement of unified communications and collaboration (UCC) solutions.
profile_positions.title: Senior Sales Engineer - Downmarket

profile_positions.description:
▶ Provide comprehensive support to the sales department throughout the sales process, specializing in promoting ICT services to both existing customers and prospective clients, primarily targeting large enterprises. The portfolio of ICT services covered a wide array of technologies, ranging from network connectivity (L2, VPN MPLS, Internet) and VoIP to LAN, Wi-Fi, cloud solutions, cybersecurity services, software development, and IoT. 

▶ Conduct collection and analysis of customer requirements, ensuring a deep understanding of their specific needs. Coordinate and plan the design of ICT solutions, ensuring seamless integration with the identified requirements. Engineering quotes for customers, diligently managing solution costs and profitability while maintaining a keen focus on service quality.

▶ Coordinate cross-departmental collaboration in preparing tender responses, Request for Information (RFI), and Request for Proposal (RFP) submissions. Facilitate seamless information sharing among relevant company departments, including sales, project management (PM), and operations, ensuring alignment and a unified approach. Disseminate key solution-related content to the respective departments, enabling a cohesive and well-informed response to meet client requirements.
profile_positions.title: Sales Engineer

profile_positions.description:
▶ As Team Leader, I assumed leadership responsibilities and focused on defining and implementing processes to support operational units, customers, and network companies for Enterprise-dedicated services. We ensured seamless activation and delivery of contracted services while fostering a culture of continuous improvement. With a dedicated team, we streamlined operations, optimized processes, and prioritized customer satisfaction.

▶ An opportunity for professional advancement was proposed by the Operations department and HR, which involved pursuing an Industrial Ph.D. program and other relevant certifications. This path aimed to promote continuous learning and development by engaging in advanced research and acquiring specialized knowledge. The Industrial Ph.D. program provided a base for in-depth exploration of the field, while the suggested certifications offered a means to enhance skills in specific areas of interest.

▶ Maintained diligent oversight of all activities and responsibilities. Continued to monitor the progress of ongoing projects with a solid commitment to excellence and ensuring that they remained on track and aligned with objectives. Provided guidance and support to my team, fostering a collaborative environment where everyone's strengths were leveraged to achieve optimal results. Remained proactive in identifying potential challenges or bottlenecks, promptly addressing them to maintain efficiency and deliver exceptional outcomes. Continued monitoring and dedication to uphold high standards of performance and drive continuous improvement within the team.
profile_positions.title: Team Leader - Business Process Manager

profile_positions.description:
▶ Define and implement robust processes and procedures to provide unwavering support to Operations, customers, and network companies, ensuring the efficient activation and steadfast delivery of contracted services. Collaborate closely with the Marketing and Technology teams to assist in the design of innovative services while also lending support to the Pre-Sales and Sales departments in tender participation. Through these efforts, contributed to the overall success of the organization by optimizing service delivery and fostering growth opportunities.

▶ Assess end-to-end processes to identify valuable improvement opportunities, resulting in waste reduction and enhanced efficiency. Transferring acquired knowledge to the teams involved, empowering them with valuable insights. Leveraged Lean Six Sigma tools to drive process optimization. Assume a leadership role in guiding cross-functional teams through process and digital transformation, ensuring seamless implementation and fostering a culture of continuous improvement.

▶ Gather operational requirements to facilitate the analysis and formulation of information system specifications in alignment with defined processes. Collaborate closely with IT development teams and actively participated in testing phases, including User Acceptance Testing (UAT), to ensure the successful implementation and functionality of the systems.

▶ Establish instructions and system requirements for network monitoring and diagnostic procedures related to customers' end-to-end (E2E) circuits. This involved comprehensive knowledge of various technologies, including GPON FTTH, P2P Ethernet Services, FWA, and DWDM. By defining these guidelines, ensure efficient and accurate monitoring and diagnosis of network circuits, enabling swift identification and resolution of potential issues.
profile_positions.title: Business Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
▶ Conducted a thorough study on credit card data management for Wolters Kluwer Italia, aiming to safeguard Cardholder Data (CHD) and achieve compliance with the PCI DSS. The study included gap analysis, vulnerability identification, and the development of a strategic roadmap with detailed instructions for enhancing data protection. The roadmap guides the implementation of necessary security measures to ensure adherence to PCI DSS requirements. 

▶ Led a comprehensive renewal project at Campus Bio-Medico in Rome, focusing on upgrading networking, servers, and storage equipment. The project encompassed an in-depth analysis of the existing infrastructure, identifying areas for improvement, defining requirements, and considering implementation constraints. Extensive research was conducted on market trends and the latest technologies, culminating in a well-informed proposal for the renewal of the hospital information system to enhance the healthcare institution's overall efficiency and effectiveness.
profile_positions.title: Cyber Security Consultant
